name: Roche Fusion
description: Roche Fusion is a retro, over the top space shooter. An all you can shoot buffet; fast paced and procedurally generated; with crazy waves of enemies, awesome upgrades and wicked boss-fights! Also: Explosions. Lots of explosions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1GHz Dual-Core Graphics: Any OpenGL 3.2 capable card (Radeon HD 2xxx Series or Mobility Radeon HD 4330; GeForce 8xxx(M) Series; Intel HD Graphics, Ivy Bridge; or higher) Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Roche Fusion will run on any graphics card with support for OpenGL 3.2 or higher. If you are not sure that your card supports this, please make sure to look it up before you buy the game. (This is especially important for older AMD mobile, and integrated Intel GPUs).
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, Radeon HD 4xxx Series, GeForce 4xx Series, or higher Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Roche Fusion really gets your blood pumping and your adrenaline running through your veins! To me it is the best schmup I have ever played. It has awesome graphics, great music, but most of all the gameplay is simply perfect. There are various ships and upgrades, which you can combine in endless ways to get all different kinds of builds. It is one of the most unforgiving and awesome games ever, you will be killed over and over and yet you will keep coming back for more.
Best game I ever played, deserve more popularity.

Feels like a bullet hell from Micheal Bay himself. Lots of fun... Lots of bullets...   And lots of explosions! :)  Everything needed for me to be addicted to a bullet hell.  But the best part is yet to come: You can play this co-op on one pc!!!  Game's just amazing

id maybe pay $2 for this game, $12 is silly  the only use i can see for this game is if you didnt have internet, assuming the game would work without.......  it will quickly turn into one of the games you dont have installed in your library though   i do not recommend purchasing this game
